module.name: fpg_imgfmt_bmp
module.descr: This unit implements a BMP (Bitmap) image reader.

element.name: ReadImage_BMP
element.short: Reads the internal structure of the BMP file.

element.name: LoadImage_BMP
element.short: Load's the image from the file specified.
element.descr: This functions loads the BMP image from the file specified and returns a TfpgImage object representing the BMP file.

element.name: LoadImage_BMP.Result
element.short: The TfpgImage represeting the BMP file.

element.name: LoadImage_BMP.AFileName
element.short: The file name on disk containing the BMP data.

element.name: CreateImage_BMP
element.short: Creates a TfpgImage representing a BMP file from data in memory.
element.descr: Creates a TfpgImage representing a BMP file from data in memory.

element.name: CreateImage_BMP.bmp
element.short: Pointer to BMP data in memory.

element.name: CreateImage_BMP.bmpsize
element.short: Size of the data in memory to read.
